actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Blue range Wilderness and Apache National Forests in the States of Arizona and New Mexico.

summary.text: Designates an area of approximately 231,300 acres in the States of Arizona and New Mexico as the Blue Range Wilderness within and as a part of the Apache National Forest.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Blue range Wilderness and Apache National Forests in the States of Arizona and New Mexico.
